thread.section_title: Affordable Golf Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Affordable Golf | affordablegolf.co.uk | 5 of 99
thread.title: Ian M
thread.title_full: Affordable Golf reviewed by Ian M

author: Ian M
title: Ian M
text: Top item and a really good price. Delivery was extremely quick and the item was well packaged. Works well, the only niggle being that it consistently fails to update from the Golf Buddy website but that's not a problem with Affordable Golf. Looks like a good range of products on the website so I'll be back.
